subject: Dear Beloved, Greetings to you
Re: Dear Beloved, Greetings to you
body:
Dear Sgt Angie,

Thank you for your message. I am intrigued by your proposal and would like to know more about it. However, I must insist on complete transparency and legality in all our dealings.

Could you please provide more details about the business and how we will proceed? Also, could you clarify what exactly my role would be in this partnership?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Mary
